RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 1 2 1/16M Hurdle CR: N/A. Allowance Purse 70000. TO BE RUN OVER NATIONAL FENCES (UP TO $12,180 NYSBFOA) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Four Year Olds, 150 lbs.; Older, 156 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. A Race In 2022 - 2023 Allowed 8 lbs. (Claiming Race s Not Considered In Allowances).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: L'IMPERATOR (FR) moved in after clearing fence one at the rear of the field, jumped well off the pace, rallied on the final turn, closed well to overtake the tired leader in upper stretch and drew away under good handling. BEAT LE BON (FR) sped clear soon after the flag-fall, jumped reasonably well while opening up a huge advantage, shortened stride on the final turn, was overtaken by the winner in upper stretch and weakened but was well clear for the place. HOFFMAN (IRE) jostled with a foe over fence two, followed the runaway leader from second, was urged along after fence seven, dropped back on the final turn and had nothing left while best of the rest. MODUS OPERANDI (IRE) jumped awkwardly over fence, leapt outward at multiple fences well while off the pace, dropped back under urging on the final turn and lacked the needed response. MR. CONNECTICUT jostled with a rival over fence two, settled outside in the three path and failed to respond. SALVINO (IRE) stumbled landing over fence one, left the course after fence three then was vanned off.

ENTRY.NAME: Modus Operandi (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: awkward fence 1,reserved well off pace,jumped out,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: L'Imperator (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: mvd in after fence one,jumped well,rally last trn,lead3/16,clear

ENTRY.NAME: Salvino (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled landing over fence 1, left course after fence 3, vanned

ENTRY.NAME: Hoffman (IRE)
ENTRY.COMMENT: jostled fence 2, followed clear leader, empty, best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Mr. Connecticut
ENTRY.COMMENT: jostled fence2,3wide,outside,failed to respond

ENTRY.NAME: Beat Le Bon (FR)
ENTRY.COMMENT: sped clear,jumped well,shortened stride final turn,collared,wknd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 2 7F Dirt CR: 97. Claiming Purse 72000. (UP TO $12,528 NYSBFOA) FOR FOUR YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD. Weight, 123 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races In 2023 Allowed 3 lbs. A Race In 2023 Allowed 5 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $32,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: LAFITTE'S FLEET coaxed from the gate, chased three then two wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, swung three to four wide into upper stretch, took over command inside the eighth pole and edged clear in the late stages to prevail. RAM coaxed from the gate, chased inside early on until tipped to the three path five furlongs from home, advanced on the leader from the outside tucking to the two path through the turn and coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths now heads apart for command, swung four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive getting herded slightly out to the eighth pole and then came inwards and was bumped by JAKE ROCKS inside that station as this top pair was displaced by the eventual winner, ran on to prevail in the battle for the place honors. JAKE ROCKS coaxed from the start, showed the way in hand from the two path down the backstretch, tucked inside into the turn and came under increased pressure from the aforementioned foe and was placed to coaxing in response at the three-eighths, swung three wide into upper stretch, came out slightly straightened away and then got directed inwards at the eventual winner as he went on by just inside the eighth pole, bumped with RAM at that juncture and ran on to the finish but was ultimately bested for the show honors by a nostril on the wire. FLINT RIDGE chased four then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five wide into upper stretch, weakened in the drive. BEAVER HAT chased five wide under coaxing from the three-eighths, went seven wide into upper stretch, tired. SILK TRADE chased four wide down the backstretch and through the turn getting lightly engaged by the rider from the five-sixteenths into upper stretch, failed to respond and went six wide into upper stretch, then got eased home through to the finish.

ENTRY.NAME: Ram
ENTRY.OWNER: Baker Christina and Mack William L
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, ins early, tip 3p 5/8, 2p turn, 4w uppr,dug in, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Lafitte's Fleet
ENTRY.OWNER: Imperio Michael Rodriguez Rudy R Speranza Steven and GRC Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, chased 3-2w, coaxed 7/16, 3-4w uppr, up, edged clear

ENTRY.NAME: Silk Trade
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4w pursuit, angled 6w upper, eased home

ENTRY.NAME: Jake Rocks
ENTRY.OWNER: FIN Stables and Sal-Lou J G Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, in hand 2p, ins turn, 3w uppr, collared, bump, ran on

ENTRY.NAME: Beaver Hat
ENTRY.OWNER: Royal Steed Racing and Scott Ryan C
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 5w, coaxed 3/8, angled 7w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Flint Ridge
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 3/8, angled 5w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 3 5 1/2F Turf CR: 81. Maiden Special Weight Purse 88000. FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES TWO YEARS OLD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisabl e to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GRAM was well placed towards the front under coaxing, came under stronger encouragement while asked to move up outside the half-mile pole, steadied outside the seven-sixteenths then dropped back into the turn, saved ground on that bend, steadied again outside the quarter-pole, was roused three wide into the stretch then quickly shifted to the five path, rallied outside to get the lead inside the furlong marker, fought outside of the runner-up to the finish and prevailed under strong urging. HEAVENLY GIRL was hustled from the gate, moved in while establishing a good position just off the pace, chased two then three wide on the turn, gained four wide into the stretch then made a bid, led under a drive into the final furlong then lost the advantage to the winner, fought on to the finish but missed while clear for the place. BAREFOOT DISCO settled towards the rear, was taken in hand when a foe crossed in front near the nine-sixteenths, saved ground on the turn, moved out while gaining under a drive in upper stretch, swapped back to her inside lead at the sixteenth-pole and safely secured the show. FOLLOW YOUR ARROW came away in good order and went straight to the front, set the pace under pressure to her outside, was asked along the rail on the turn, lost the advantage in upper stretch, dropped back into the final furlong and weakened. BEING BETTY was bumped while off a bit slow then checked, shied out badly and was taken up significantly early, spotted the front many lengths, raced at the rear, went three wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and improved position. MEL'S ANGEL was bumped at the start then forced into another foe and taken up, dropped towards the rear, moved out around the nine-sixteenths, went three then four wide on the turn, was driven five wide into the stretch then moved out, chased outside into the final furlong and tired. INCA MUMMY pressed the pace on the outside under urging, vied in the two path on the turn, dropped back into upper stretch and capitulated. NEEDED broke a half-step slow, moved up to track the pace on the outside, made a bid in the three path on the turn, fought under a drive in upper stretch, dropped back into the final furlong and also tired. SARATOGA SMOKESHOW broke a step slow, was ridden along on the outside, went around the turn in the two path and was no factor. LOVE THYSELF broke out and bumped with a foe then shied in shortly thereafter, ducked in sharply early then hit the temporary rail and unseated the rider then was walked off after being caught by an outrider.

ENTRY.NAME: Love Thyself
ENTRY.COMMENT: brk out,bmpd,shied in,ducked in,hit rail,unseated rider,wlkd off

ENTRY.NAME: Mel's Angel
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,forced out,tkn up,mvd out,3-4w turn,5w1/4,mvd out,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Being Betty
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,bit slw,chckd,shied out badly,tkn up,3p trn,5p1/4,imprvd

ENTRY.NAME: Follow Your Arrow
ENTRY.COMMENT: away well,hustled,set pressured pace,ins turn,headed3/16,wknd

ENTRY.NAME: Barefoot Disco
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled towards rear,in hand4-1/2,inside turn,mvd out,up for show

ENTRY.NAME: Gram
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed,urged1/2,stdy7/16,ins,stdy outside1/4,5w3/16,rallied

ENTRY.NAME: Saratoga Smokeshow
ENTRY.OWNER: Toga Party Racing Stable Feld Sean and Smith Holli D
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow,urged outside,2p turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Heavenly Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,mvd in,well placed,2-3p trn,4p1/4,bid3/16,led,headed,miss

ENTRY.NAME: Inca Mummy
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed outside,urged along,vied 2path turn,capitulated

ENTRY.NAME: Needed
ENTRY.COMMENT: off 1/2 step slow,mvd up,tracked,bid 3path turn,empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: Honorable Miss H. - Grade2 SARATOGA RACE 4 6F Dirt CR: 100. Stakes Purse 200000. A HANDICAP FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Non-Lasix race pursuant to 4043.2 (7)(e)(5) Lasix not permitted within 48 hours of post time. By subscription of $200 each which should accompany the nomination; $1,000 to pass the entry box and an additional $1,000 to start. For horses not originally nominated, a supplemental payment of $1,000 in addition to the entry and starting fees may be made at any time prior to the publication of weights . The purse to be divided 55% to the winner, 20% t o second, 12% to third, 6% to fourth, 4% to fifth and 3% divided equally amongst the remaining finishers. A trophy will be presented to the winning owner. Closed Saturday, July 15, 2023 with 18 Nominations.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ECHO ZULU coaxed from the gate, showed the way from the two path down the backstretch under pressure from FRANK'S ROCKETTE to the outside, tucked inside at the half mile pole and remained inside through the turn coming under coaxing near the quarter pole, took the inside route into upper stretch, floated two then three wide straightened away while going clear under a light drive, got taken in hand and was geared down through the final sixteenth to the finish to prevail comfortably at the end. DR B broke on top and was quickly relegated to third chasing four wide down the backstretch, tucked three wide through the turn coming under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, proved no match for the top one while keeping on to secure the place honors clear of the rest. FRANK'S ROCKETTE broke out a step brushing the off side stall at the start, came under coaxing and pressed the pace of ECHO ZULU from the outside three then two wide into the turn, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside at the quarter pole before floating to the four path straightened away, dug in shaken off and weakened to the finish. MARYQUITECONTRARY bobbled at the start and was away last, chased four wide coming under prolonged coaxing from the seven-sixteenths, tipped five wide into upper stretch and trailed throughout.

ENTRY.NAME: Echo Zulu
ENTRY.OWNER: L and N Racing LLC and Winchell Thoroughbreds LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, cut pace 2p, ins 1/4, went clear, geared down

ENTRY.NAME: Frank's Rockette
ENTRY.COMMENT: brush gate, pressed 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 2w 1/4p, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Maryquitecontrary
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobble st, 4w pursuit, coaxed 7/16, 5w upper, trailed throughout

ENTRY.NAME: Dr B
ENTRY.OWNER: Cash is King LLC and LC Racing LLC
ENTRY.COMMENT: 4-3w pursuit, coaxed 5/16, 4w upper, no match, kept on, up 2nd

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 5 1 1/16M Inner turf CR: 89. Claiming Purse 50000. INNER TURF (UP TO $8,700 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $35,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Du e At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: RELATE was hustled from the gate, angled in while going to the front, showed the way on the inside, shook clear with three furlongs to run, responded well when set down in upper stretch, came under a right-handed crop inside the furlong marker and held under steady urging. QUALITY G was fractious in the gate then flipped before quickly righting himself, was backed out then deemed fit to run by the state veterinarian, came away in good order, was well placed just off the pace on the inside, shifted to the two path coming to the quarter-pole, pursued the winner under a drive in the stretch and finished with good courage to safely secure the place. ST. JOE LOUIS (GB) broke in then moved in while taken in hand early, was rated under a snug hold in the two path between foes, shifted three wide while roused at the quarter-pole then drifted further out before being straightened by the rider, pursued the top two in the stretch and lacked the needed kick while able to get the show. BILLY'S GOT ISSUES angled in towards the rear, saved ground while unhurried towards the back, was roused after turning into the stretch, moved out inside the three-sixteenths and improved position. ENDOWED broke out and bumped with a foe, settled on the inside, was urged along on the far turn and lacked the needed response. DON'T LET ME DOWN tossed his head while rank under tight restraint nearing the first turn, went three wide under a strong hold on that bend, was reserved off the pace, came under urging late on the backstretch, went three wide on the far turn and failed to rally. ADDICTED TO YOU was restless in the gate, became keen under restraint nearing the first turn, went three wide on that bend, settled towards the back, traveled two then three wide on the far turn, shifted four wide at the quarter-pole, moved out in upper stretch and failed to threaten. MAMA BANNED ME bumped with an opponent at the start while last to commence, was urged early, went three wide on the turns, came five wide into the stretch and was no factor. MOON WATCH (IRE) bumped with a rival at the start then had his path taken, rounded the opening bend in the four path, was rated outside without the benefit of cover, traveled three then four wide on the far turn, dropped back into upper stretch and capitulated. LIL BRO COOP was bumped at the start and forced in, went three wide on the first turn, prompted the pace on the outside, chased two to three wide on the far turn and came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Quality G
ENTRY.COMMENT: flipped in gate,well placed inside,shift 2p1/4,chased,clear 2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Don't Let Me Down
ENTRY.COMMENT: tossed head rank into 1st,3p,reserved,ask7/16,3p2nd,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Endowed
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,bmpd,settled inside,urged 2nd turn,no rally

ENTRY.NAME: Mama Banned Me
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,last away,urged early,3w turns,5w1/4,mvd out,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Addicted to You
ENTRY.COMMENT: restless gate,keen into 1st,2-3path turns,4w1/4,mvd out,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Lil Bro Coop
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,forced in,3p1st,outside,2-3p2nd turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Moon Watch (IRE)

TRACK.NAME: Foreign track with Code of NC

ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,path taken,4w1st,rated out,no cover,3-4w2nd,empty

ENTRY.NAME: St. Joe Louis (GB)
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke in,mvd in,tight hold 2p btwn,3p1/4,drift out,chsd,no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Billy's Got Issues
ENTRY.OWNER: West Paces Racing LLC Adelphi Racing Club and Dark Horse Racing Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: angled in,unhurried inside,ask ins1/4,mvd out,improved

ENTRY.NAME: Relate
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,angled in,inside pace,clr2nd trn,ask1/4,responded,driving

WINNERS_DETAILS.BREEDER: Hidden Lake Farm, LLC & South Elkhorn

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 6 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 83. Allowance Purse 95000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: ICHIBAN raced along the inside through the first turn before chasing two to three wide down the backstretch, went three then four wide through the far turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, tipped six wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive getting on track nearing the sixteenth marker as the leader began to shorten stride and surged home to just get up in the shadow of the wire and score. APRIL ANTICS coaxed from the gate, raced two then three wide through the first turn, chased four then three wide advancing into the far turn, steadily gained outside the duel while in hand to take over the front nearing the quarter pole, swung three to four wide into upper stretch set down for the drive, edged clear under a drive to the eighth pole, dug in under lone threat and shortened stride inside the final sixteenth growing leg weary under challenge and was nailed on the wire. ATHENA BEACH coaxed from the gate, dueled from the two path with DANSEUR D'ORO to her outside, tucked inside into the far turn coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, clung to command from the her main pace rival when overtaken as a tandem nearing the quarter pole, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and kept on to preserve the show honors. DUCKPHAT saved ground at the tail of the field, came under coaxing with seven-sixteenths to go, spun two to three wide at the quarter pole, then tipped out to be six to seven wide straightened away and kicked on belatedly to miss for the show honors. SHESASCOLDASICE just off the inside through the opening bend, chased four paths off the inside down the backstretch until tucked inside half a mile from home, came under coaxing with seven-sixteenths remaining, cut the corner into upper stretch and offered no kick. DANSEUR D'ORO stumbled at the start, dueled three then two wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, got overthrown in concert with her main pace rival near the quarter pole and went five wide into upper stretch, then tired in the drive. BIG HAZEL bobbled at the break, race four wide through the first turn and then gave chase four to five wide down the backstretch and through the far turn under coaxing with seven-sixteenths to go, went six wide into upper stretch and tired.

ENTRY.NAME: Ichiban
ENTRY.COMMENT: ins 1st trn, chased 2-3w, coaxed 3-4w 7/16, 6w uppr, just up

ENTRY.NAME: April Antics
ENTRY.COMMENT: coax st, 2-3w 1st trn, chased 4-3w, up, 3-4w uppr, clear, nailed

ENTRY.NAME: Duckphat
ENTRY.COMMENT: saved grd at rear, coaxed 7/16, 2-3w uppr, tip out 7w, belatedly

ENTRY.NAME: Shesascoldasice
ENTRY.COMMENT: 2p 1st trn, chased 4w, to ins 1/2, coax 7/16, cut corner, no kick

ENTRY.NAME: Big Hazel
ENTRY.OWNER: Donk David G Carlson Dustin and Bernard Albert W
ENTRY.COMMENT: bobbled st, 4w 1st turn, chased 4-5w, 6w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Danseur d'Oro
ENTRY.COMMENT: stumbled st, dueled 3-2w, coaxed 3/8, 5w upper, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Athena Beach
ENTRY.COMMENT: coaxed st, dueled 2p, coaxed ins 7/16, yielded, 2w 1/4p, kept on

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 7 5 1/2F Turf CR: 108. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 162500. (PURSE $125,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $28,275 NYSBFOA) FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 THREE TIMES OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON FOUR RACES OR WHICH HAVE NOT WON A RACE IN 20 23 OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $80,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $80,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at Five and One Half Furlongs on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: OUR SHOT brushed with a rival at the start then was hustled, disputed the pace on the inside of an opponent, was eased back off the pace leaving the backstretch, shifted to the two path near the five-sixteenths, gained to make a three wide bid at the quarter-pole, was asked for his best in upper stretch, battled gamely between horses in the final furlong and narrowly prevailed under strong handling. ARREST ME RED stalked the pace on the outside then in the three path on the turn, made a bid while asked in the four path at the quarter-pole, fought with multiple foes in the stretch and just missed while narrowly able to get the place. BRING ME A CHECK broke out at the start, was well placed just off the pace, went around the turn in the two path, was given his cue near the quarter-pole, dropped in behind horses in upper stretch, chased along the rail into the final furlong, gained to make a bid near the sixteenth-pole, fought with the top two to the finish and just missed while able to get the show. OUTLAW KID settled just off the pace on the outside, was asked four wide on the turn, made a five wide bid into the stretch, fought outside of the top three wide into the final sixteenth and was outfinished. THIN WHITE DUKE was hustled from the gate, settled under some urging, was roused three wide on the turn then driven four wide into the stretch, moved out while chasing the leaders in the final furlong and finished willingly to just miss the superfecta. COPPOLA disputed the pace on the outside, moved to a solo advantage leaving the backstretch, dropped from the two path to the rail on the turn, was asked nearing the quarter-pole then spun into the stretch in the two path, battled with several foes under a drive into the final furlong, was grabbed with the left-rein while coming out slightly around the sixteenth-pole and was out-kicked. ARZAK brushed with a rival at the start then was taken up, settled at the rear, went three wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch then angled further out and gained but missed the superfecta. CHEWING GUM settled on the outside towards the rear, traveled around the turn in the two path, was driven three wide into the stretch and failed to threaten. MAXWELL ESQUIRE was hustled from the gate, settled on the inside of a foe towards the rear, saved ground on the turn and was no factor.

ENTRY.NAME: Bring Me a Check
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,well placed,2p turn,ask1/4,drop in 3/16,bid1/16,missed

ENTRY.NAME: Our Shot
ENTRY.OWNER: Gatsas Stables Schoenfeld Steven and Terranova II John P
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd brk,hustld,pace ins foe,backed off 7/16,2p5/16,3wbid,gamely

ENTRY.NAME: Arzak
ENTRY.COMMENT: brshd brk,taken up,at rear,3w turn,5w1/4,angled out,gained

ENTRY.NAME: Maxwell Esquire
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,settled inside foe,saved ground,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Thin White Duke
ENTRY.OWNER: Gleaves Philip A Crist Steven deRegt Ken and Hilliard Bryan
ENTRY.COMMENT: hustled,settled some urging,3w turn,4w1/4,mvd out,chased,willing

ENTRY.NAME: Chewing Gum
ENTRY.OWNER: Pantofel Stable Wachtel Stable and Zaro Jerold L
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled outside,2path turn,3p into lane,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Coppola
ENTRY.COMMENT: outside pace,2p-ins turn,fought with foes,in hand1/16,outkicked

ENTRY.NAME: Arrest Me Red
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked outside,3p trn,bid 4p1/4,fought with multiple foes,denied

ENTRY.NAME: Outlaw Kid
ENTRY.OWNER: R A Hill Stable and SGV Thoroughbreds
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace,outside,ask 4w turn,bid5w1/4,outfinished

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 8 1 1/8M Dirt CR: 85. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 100000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. Three Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Afte rcare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: AMANDA'S FOLLY established the front and showed the way in hand just off the inside under attendance and facing some pressure from EROS'S GIRL to the outside, had the runner up advance outside that foe midway on the far turn and came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths in response, spun just off the inside into upper stretch, dug in under a drive drifting out four paths through to the sixteenth marker, got corrected inside that station and held game head cocked to the infield to the wire. SWEET MYSTERY broke out trading a bump at the start with B B'S BUSTED, who broke inwards, raced three wide through the first turn before chasing four wide down the backstretch and through the far turn advancing on the top pair three furlongs from home, came under coaxing at the five-sixteenths, swung four wide into upper stretch, dug in under a drive latched on the aforementioned foe through the final furlong and fought on to the end but was ultimately rebuffed at the end. OK HONEY chased just off the inside briefly tucking inside at the half mile pole before tipping back to the two path when placed to coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch and drifted an additional path or two in tandem with a pair rivals and improved position to secure the show honors. EROS'S GIRL attended the leader from the outside in the three path, began to apply pressure to that rival into the far turn and upped the ante three furlongs out when placed to coaxing, angled five wide into upper stretch in the midst of being shaken off, drifted out with two rivals straightened away and weakened to the finish. B B'S BUSTED broke in at the start trading a bump with SWEET MYSTERY, raced four wide into the first turn before tucking to the two path soon after, chased three to four wide coming under coaxing at the seven-sixteenths, went six wide into upper stretch and drifted out straightened away in concert with a pair of foes and weakened.

ENTRY.NAME: Amanda's Folly
ENTRY.COMMENT: in hand 2p, coaxed 5/16, 2w 1/4p, drifted out, dug in, held game

ENTRY.NAME: Eros's Girl
ENTRY.COMMENT: attended 3w, coaxed 3/8, tipped 5w upper, weakened

ENTRY.NAME: Ok Honey
ENTRY.COMMENT: chased 2p, coaxed 7/16, angled 5-6w upper, improved

ENTRY.NAME: Sweet Mystery
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, 3w 1st turn, 4w pursuit, bid 3/8, 4w upper, fought on

ENTRY.NAME: B B's Busted
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped st, 4w into 1st trn, chased 3-4w, 6w upper, weakened

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 9 1 3/8M Inner turf CR: 97. Allowance Purse 149500. INNER TURF (PURSE $115,000 FOR NON-NYB) (UP TO $26,013 NYSBFOA) FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING, STARTER OR STATE BRED ALLOWANCE OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 125 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over Allowed 2 lbs. (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SIEMPRE ELEGANTE jostled with a foe early then was placed under a strong hold, saved ground on the first turn, was reserved off the pace between foes, traveled around the second turn in the two path, remained under reserve towards the back, started the final turn in the two path, shifted out over heels outside the quarter-pole, swung five wide into the stretch, rallied on the outside, closed strongly to get the lead coming to the sixteenth-pole then moved clear under a brisk hand-ride to prevail. ANATOLIAN was rated towards the front on the outside in the three path, came under urging with three furlongs to run, chased in the four path on the final turn, gained under a drive to take the lead in upper stretch, led until just before the sixteenth-pole but was overtaken while clear for the place. AVENUE NIEL (IRE) jostled with a rival early while taken in hand, went around the first turn in the two path, saved ground while rated under snug restraint, moved up with five furlongs to run, made a rail bid late on the backstretch, took a short lead while along the rail at the five-sixteenths, lost the advantage under a drive in upper stretch, dropped back into the final sixteenth and weakened but held the show. RHOMBIQUE bumped with a rival at the start, was reserved inside through the first two turns, settled towards the back, traveled around the final turn in the two path, was roused three wide into the stretch, raced between foes passing the three-sixteenths, bumped with a rival at the furlong marker and lacked the needed kick. ELLE EST FORTE was reserved on the outside while three to four wide, came under urging late on the backstretch, turned into upper stretch under a drive, raced between horses passing the three-sixteenths, bumped with a foe at the furlong marker and also lacked the needed kick. EMBRACE ME jostled with a rival early then dropped back while placed under tight restraint, settled at the rear while inside to the two path, was roused three to four wide on the final turn, drifted in some in upper stretch, moved out inside the furlong marker and failed to rally. SISTER BRIDGET (IRE) moved in while going to the front, dropped from the two path to the rail on the first turn, showed the way with some company to her outside, lost the lead at the five-sixteenths, battled under a drive in upper stretch, dropped back into the final furlong and gave way. OUT OF SIGHT broke out and bumped with a foe then was hustled, steadied while taken under vigorous restraint along the rail entering the first turn, was rated while tugging rankly on the bit, came off the rail while still under stout restraint with five furlongs to run, saved ground while asked on the far turn and came up empty. SUCH SOUNDS was restless in the gate, became eager when taken under a strong hold early, raced under restraint while reserved in the two to three path, came under urging late on the backstretch and failed to respond. I'M SO SORRY was hustled from the gate, went three then two wide on the first turn, stalked the pace on the outside, chased on the far turn and had nothing left .

ENTRY.NAME: Avenue Niel (IRE)

RACE.RACE_TEXT: SARATOGA RACE 10 1 1/16M Turf CR: 73. Waiver Maiden Claiming Purse 50000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 118 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be V oid). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track). (Rail at 18 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: INDIAN MISCHIEF crossed to the inside steadily after the start to be in the two path into the first turn latching on VINCE THE PRINCE to the outside through that bend, knocked heads in hand dueling down the backstretch and into the far turn with that rival coming under coaxing near the quarter pole and taking command straightened away, came under a left handed crop and drifted out two paths directly in front and impeding HE'S A LUCKY GUY forcing that foe to check just off his heels sharp enough to displace large chunks of the sod in a halt while brushing that foe with his hindquarters, inched away under a drive now with some breathing room and drifted in under a right handed crop to the rail while holding safe to the finish kept to task. HE'S A LUCKY GUY coaxed from the gate, tracked the duel along the inside from a loose pocket, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled out and swung three wide into upper stretch advancing on the top pair, had INDIAN MISCHIEF come out under a left handed crop just when latching on VINCE THE PRINCE and was forced to check directly off the heels of INDIAN MISCHIEF, her two front legs passing to either side of the rear left leg of INDIAN MISCHIEF before displacing some sod when checked and brushing with the hindquarters of that rival, lost two lengths of momentum as a result and came under renewed encouragement to get going once more and showed good courage to keep on for the place honors while never recovering the full flight she had to the furlong grounds prior to the incident. VINCE THE PRINCE got bumped askew at the start by ENGLISH STORM, who broke inwards, established the front shortly after the start along the rail into the first turn and got latched on by the eventual winner to the outside, dueled in hand along the inside down the backstretch and through the far turn coming under coaxing under threat with five-sixteenths to go, took the inside route into upper stretch under challenge and was headed straightened away, dug in under a drive latched on to the eighth pole, then ran on to preserve the show honors by a neck on the wire. CONQUIST broke out at the start bumping WAYWARD GHOST in tandem with SHARP PLAY BOY, settled two then three wide just off the duel coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled four wide into upper stretch, kept on to just secure the last major share. ENGLISH STORM broke in at the start bumping VINCE THE PRINCE and knocking him briefly sideways, chased two then three wide coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled five to six wide into upper stretch and improved position to finish offering up a belated bid. YOUR MISSION two to three wide in pursuit from mid pack, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, angled out five wide into upper stretch, offered up a bid but was out-finished. AULA tracked the pace along the inside coming under coaxing three furlongs from home, continued in the inside route into upper stretch and made no headway through to the finish. WAFLR four paths off the inside past the stands the initial time, tucked three wide with seven and a half furlongs to run directly in front and impeding CONTROL ALT DELETE and forcing that foe to clip heels before he could check and alter out, settled just off the inside near the rear of the field, came under coaxing at the three-eighths, spun just off the inside into upper stretch and offered no response. SHARP PLAY BOY broke in at the start bumping WAYWARD GHOST in concert with CONQUIST, chased three then two wide from just off the pace, came under coaxing three furlongs from home, swung three wide into upper stretch and tired. DRUID chased along the inside coming under coaxing at the three-eighths, took the inside route into upper stretch and made no impact. WAYWARD GHOST got bumped between foes at the start who each broke his way, was near the rear of the field four wide moving into the first turn when CONTROL ALT DELETE was impeded just to his inside and clipped the back of the guilty party WAFLR, had that foe recover outwards bobbling and got carried out to the six path before allowing that foe to clear and making a darting tuck to the two path, lost ground and momentum and joined CONTROL ALT DELETE detached as a pair well behind the rest of the field, chased just off the inside from that point on into upper stretch while eased home to the finish having lost all chance. CONTROL ALT DELETE settled three wide near the rear into the first turn, had WAFLR tuck directly in front from the outside and was checked and attempted to alter out but clipped the back of that rival's heels bobbling heavily and recovering outwards carrying out WAYWARD GHOST with him, remained out six paths until tucked steadily back to the three path into the backstretch now well behind the rest of the field with the exception of the lone rival caught outside him, chased three wide, went three to four wide for home while eased through to the finish having lost all chance early on. There was a Stewards' Inquiry into the stretch run focusing on the incident at the eighth pole between INDIAN MISCHIEF and HE'S A LUCKY GUY. After review, the result was allowed to stand and the race was declared official.
